title: Investors’ Last-Minute Holiday Shopping Guide
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Still scrambling to get your children, nephews or nieces something that will make a meaningful impact? Credit card, mortgage and auto loans have straight-lined over the past 15 years, while student loans have skyrocketed nearly 500%. That’s signals a “with it” gift for indebted grads. For not yet college-age kids, you can offer them a skill that will give them a genuine leg up. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
